abstract: Former jockey agent Manuel Gonzalez is charged with illegally accessing New York Racing Association computers to get information on horses for his client.
lead_paragraph: The authorities in New York said the former jockey agent Manuel Gonzalez had been charged with illegally using the New York Racing Association’s computers.
snippet: The authorities in New York said the former jockey agent Manuel Gonzalez had been charged with illegally using the New York Racing Association’s computers....
